alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 01 at 12:04AM CDT until August 01 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of west central Missouri, including the following area, Johnson MO. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms producing locally heavy rainfall are likely within the watch area tonight. Rain amounts of 2-4 inches with locally up to 6 inches are possible within the watch area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
